title: I can't switch on my pixel after recharge. I stay in Malaysia, and want to find place to repair it
content: Nothing, coz can't even switch on my phone. When I unplug it, the screen still showed a battery sign on it for recharging. After unplug, and when I try to switch on, suddenly didn't work. Even when I plug this again with charger, the battery sign didn't come up anymore
